>
[Ratspeak](/Feats.aspx?ID=5655) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ratfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=769" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 30 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) skill with rodents, including beavers, mice, porcupines, rats, and squirrels, but not with other mammals, such as dogs or bats. The GM determines which [animals](/Traits.aspx?ID=531) count as rodents.

<title level="2">Ratspeak leads to...</title>
[Call the Swarm](/Feats.aspx?ID=5671)
